data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Perl 5.7.3 and later ships with an adequate set of Chinese
    encodings. However, the numbers of Chinese encodings are staggering,
    and a complete coverage will easily increase the size of perl
    distribution by several megabytes; hence, this CPAN module tries to
    provide the rest of them.
